meanings.sent1: My dad drives an econobox to save money on gas.
meanings.sent2: The econobox parked next to me at the store was so tiny!
meanings.sent3: Why did the clown car have to be an econobox? It's hilarious!
meanings.sent4: In the sea of SUVs, her econobox stood out like a minnow among sharks.
meanings.sent5: The econobox zipped through traffic like a nimble little beetle.

meanings.definition: A compact vehicle designed for economical transportation.
meanings.sent1: The econobox was perfect for city driving with its small size.
meanings.sent2: She chose an econobox for its affordability and practicality.
meanings.sent3: The race car driver decided to take the econobox for a spin, just for fun!
meanings.sent4: His mind was an econobox, efficiently processing information without waste.
meanings.sent5: The econobox hummed along the highway, proving its efficiency once again.
